Hi All,
I am going to being setting up our repository. I have
taken note of some of the recommendations. So I will
go ahead and set something up and we can make changes
from there. One question I did have though was, how do
we want to upload documentation to this site?
Do we want anyone/everyone to be able to upload ( so
we do it via a web interface) Or do we want to log
into unix machine and ftp it?  What do you recommend?
Thanks
Rog
